name: One Essence
description:
Michael Parr's entry for GMTK Jam 2019

You have ONLY ONE resource at your disposal, your essence.

Your essence is your health, getting hurt by running into enemies reduces it.

Your essence is your mana, using attacks depletes it.

Your essence is your time remaining, it will deplete over time.

Your essence is your point total, defeating enemies will ADD to your essence. 

Move your cursor to move your character. Clicking creates an attack bubble, if enemies hit it while they are purple, they will be defeated, earning you essence.

I used Unity to create it, and made everything else myself during the jam! (Minus the music, I had already made that)

I hope you enjoy! Please comment what you thought of it, and if you were able to win!
